website_summaries.verdict: This ball has great gripping surface, but it's a little heavier and bouncier too, since it's meant for indoor and outdoor use.
pros: UA GRIPSKIN Composite for grip and feel
Deep channel design with full ball pebbling
80% nylon windings for shape retention100% butyl bladder for maximum air retention
cons: Consider using indoors only for long-lasting use

customer_reviews.title: I like the tack on the ball
customer_reviews.text: This is the second of these balls I've bought (I play a lot of outdoor basketball in the summer) and it will be my last. It was really hard to play with right out of the box because it's just not round and the weight isn't well distributed. It ends up bouncing a little off-kilter and causing unfortunate-looking turnovers because it doesn't return to your palm in the place it should (if you spin it up in the air, you can see the wobble). I like the tack on the ball, but they were out super fast. I'll probably go back to Spalding after this ball wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great ball, and awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: Great ball, and awesome quality. I have two boys who use lots of underarmor football gear, so I figured the basketball would be a pretty sweet ball. I was right, the quality was much better than what I was expecting and it was great to use on the court with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Durden

customer_reviews.title: Best Outdoor Option
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 other basketballs for the outdoor court in the last few months and this one is holding up the best by far. Now it is the favorite and even at that it still looks better than any of the others (Wilson, Spalding) So far the best outdoor ball for feel and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Matt M

customer_reviews.title: This ball is pretty nice. It is a little more bouncy than ...
customer_reviews.text: This ball is pretty nice. It is a little more bouncy than other balls and the surface is a little tougher, so it feels a little harder on your hands. But, it is an indoor/outdoor ball and is designed to be tough for that purpose. It also feels a little more dense than other basketballs. But, it is very well made and holds up to outdoor play.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Heavy outside use and still has good grip.
customer_reviews.text: I play almost every day. Lots of full court games. After 3 months even though there are other balls available this is the one the guys want to play with even after 3 months of heavy use. Yes there is wear not but the grip is still good. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: very good value at current Amazon price
customer_reviews.text: Solid Basketball, very good value at current Amazon price. I'm using for middle school basketball, kids like it. Even though it's marketed indoor/outdoor, it's a quality indoor basketball. Probably not as good as high level balls like wilson evolution or nike airlock but solid basketball. Happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: kheldar

customer_reviews.title: Best indoor/outdoor ball in this price range
customer_reviews.text: Grip and feel is nice. Much better quality than the major brand balls of similar price they sell in major department stores. The best indoor/outdoor ball I've owned in this price range for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam F.

customer_reviews.title: They both love them and my oldest boys coach actually prefers to ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, a 28.5 and a 29.5 for each of my boys. They both love them and my oldest boys coach actually prefers to use my sons ball over the ones he brings for practice.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Stopperich

customer_reviews.title: Great for shooting comfort and accuracy.
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid ball to play with. Super grippy and has a good weight to it. I've run 5's with this ball quite a few times already with this ball, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: B.A. Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ball looked good and felt good out of the package, but has already gone lopsided after minimal use.
customer_reviews.author: A Bloom

customer_reviews.title: This is my third favorite ball that I own
customer_reviews.text: This is my third favorite ball that I own! The other 2 are physically attached to me so I can play with them anytime
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: but was so happy I had gotten the
customer_reviews.text: the grandson was thrilled with the ball. He had picked out the 395, but was so happy I had gotten the 495
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Grubb

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great ball, but would NOT recommend for outdoor use. Keep it on the hardwood and you'll be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Chi-town MacDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Some parts of it are peeling after using it for about a year. I use it indoor only.
customer_reviews.author: Peterson Mathew

customer_reviews.title: Good Ball
customer_reviews.text: My brother and I play basketball outdoors about 4 days a week and we love this basketball. It feels good at first (obviously wears down outdoors) and retains air pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Usmaan Bajwa

customer_reviews.title: ... it can be used for both indoor and outdoor-he loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for teenage boy-great that it can be used for both indoor and outdoor-he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Reasor

customer_reviews.title: Better for outdoors than the
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my grandson. He thinks he's a star now. Only a couple bucks more than the 395. Better for outdoors than the 395
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice ball, great look, feel, grip, a bit heavy though
customer_reviews.author: C. Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved this ball
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is only wearing under ARMOUR to high school this year he's on the basketball team and this ball was an absolute hit
customer_reviews.author: anthony lunsford

customer_reviews.title: Feels small and heavy. After warming up with it ...
customer_reviews.text: Feels small and heavy. After warming up with it before a game there was a very noticeable difference between it and the gameball.
customer_reviews.author: EP4444

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking , this ball is garbage
customer_reviews.text: Bought to shoot basketball with grandson . Poor bounce , I have to inflate every time we use it . Garbage
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: not bad for the price, not great. its a little on the heavy side and a little firm compared to others
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Its a little grippy and wears on the hands until you break it in and the grips wear off a bit. Used indoors, so I can't speak to the use outdoor
customer_reviews.author: RoKell

customer_reviews.title: very good buy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to replace the spalding zio ball that continually wore at quickly. this ball has a great feel, and great channel gaps perfect for extra grip. I do recommend this product! surprised under armour would make such a good product.
customer_reviews.author: dchook

customer_reviews.title: great ball. Feels a little smaller than wilsons for ...
customer_reviews.text: great ball. Feels a little smaller than wilsons for some reason
customer_reviews.author: 500abarth

customer_reviews.title: Good grip, meh dribble
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have a great bounce to it. Very grippy but I didn't have any patience to "break it in"
customer_reviews.author: S. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great basketball
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Christmas for my 14 year old son. So far, it has held up air fine and he really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Kulstad

customer_reviews.title: Good ball, good feel
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my teenage son and he just loves it. Nice cover, true bounce, holds air very well...
customer_reviews.author: William Morrill

customer_reviews.title: It gathers dust easily. With that said
customer_reviews.text: The skin is too slippery. It gathers dust easily. With that said, It is usable.
customer_reviews.author: Tumi

customer_reviews.title: it is a great ball. I only use it indoors and it ...
customer_reviews.text: it is a great ball. I only use it indoors and it has a great grip and feeling to it
customer_reviews.author: Rachel H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball
customer_reviews.text: My son plays basketball and he loved the ball. Under Armour has really made a great ball. The air lasts forever and the ball has amazing grip too.
customer_reviews.author: S K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball
customer_reviews.text: Great ball. Good grip and durability. Let's see if it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: HeyGonzo

customer_reviews.title: the ball is great for indoor use
customer_reviews.text: Ball is okay but does not hold up very well with outdoor use. If you buy this ball, only use it indoors, otherwise you will be buying a new ball within a couple of weeks. Other than that, the ball is great for indoor use.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Abernethy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Under Armour product, Cheaper $ then the big box retailers
customer_reviews.author: Steve Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Ballin!!
customer_reviews.text: Great high quality product. I will buy this for my other nephew now that i know how awesome it is.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: Great ball! This ball has a great bounce and grip. Also, the balls weight is on the average side. A very nice quality for a decent price. I've had no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Barragan

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be good quality. He likes it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Grandson for Christmas. Seems to be good quality. He likes it!
customer_reviews.author: Delorce Clark

customer_reviews.title: Ours was defective.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's basketball team ordered 6 of these and they were great. I ordered the exact same one and it has little bounce to it. Air is fine. All we can figure out is that the bladder might not have stayed attached from the factory. Will be returning. UPDATE: Amazon was great about sending us another. Will be sending the original back. I've read the same problems we had on other's reviews. The new one is bouncing fine. Hopefully the hide doesn't come off like over read had happened to others.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: So far I've played with this ball a few times indoors. I meant to buy it as an outdoor ball, but it feels so nice, i want to use it as a indoor ball. It is a touch heavier than a TF-1000, but the ball still feels great. The under armor logo is a little slippery compared to the rest of the ball, but i never noticed while playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase, relatively inexpensive for the quality of this ball. Great grip and feel, which is what i was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: xchivox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great on outdoor courts....I would recommend this ball to use on any court.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good grip
customer_reviews.text: Used for outside. Have used it for a couple of months and the grip has held up as well as I could expect for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: JOSH

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ball. I've been playing with this guy outside for a couple weeks now. As expected, it's worn down considerably from outdoor play, but I can see it lasting for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great ball!
customer_reviews.text: Great ball. This is my first time trying an under armour ball, but this thing is good! I've only used it indoors, but it has great feel. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: David A

customer_reviews.title: Very good ball
customer_reviews.text: This ball is very good for indoor courts. The only slight issues are that the ball feels a touch heavy and that in a very hot gym the grip can be a little slippery. I am very happy overall with the ball. Very close to a rock, except grip is not as soft.
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: The local basketball team really like the performance of the ball and the feel
customer_reviews.text: The local basketball team really like the performance of the ball and the feel. so we order 20 of them
customer_reviews.author: David Skillings

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great ball. Great grip. I own 6 basketballs and this one is my favorite.

customer_reviews.title: ... it a week ball got stolen so keep a good eye on
customer_reviews.text: Anyone could shoot well with this ball didn't even so keep a good eye on it
customer_reviews.author: Ronee00

customer_reviews.title: hmmmm questionable
customer_reviews.text: indoor/outdoor or no door:? the ball just after 2 weeks hasnt stood up the the challenge, the super grip whatever they spoke about isnt fantastic and not something you should look forward to. the weight of the ball is nice and balanced but i expected more from the ball. for the price not bad.
customer_reviews.author: J A

customer_reviews.title: Keeps going flat
customer_reviews.text: I have used this ball twice indoors and it went flat within 3 days after each use. Stick with a reputable ball. Underarmour is not there yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Spalding EXCEL Zi/O is a better ball.
customer_reviews.text: This ball is a bit heavy. The Spalding EXCEL Zi/O is a better ball.
customer_reviews.author: Sven

customer_reviews.title: Great basketball
customer_reviews.text: I would rate this just as good, if not BETTER, than the Spalding TF-1000 ZK Microfiber Composite. The grip is great and it wears down very well. Minimal break-in time required. I only use this for indoor play. Great basketball
customer_reviews.author: drewrhino

customer_reviews.title: Not For Outdoor Use
customer_reviews.text: After only about an hour of shooting on our driveway, one of the edges started peeling off. Got a replacement and using it indoors only and it's holding up well. Purchased a highly rated Spalding for outdoors for less than $15 and it's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: It's okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: I think it was reasonably priced. It had a great feel to it out of the box, it is exactly 29.5 although a few people said the ball feels heavy the weight was 20 oz. After 3, 1.5 hour sessions (2 outdoor and 1 indoor) and cleaning it with a damp cloth after each use. There is a bubble forming about 3 inches long. It is slight but noticeable. The nice grip is gone but I didn't expect it to stay that way. You have to get the air pressure correct to keep the correct bounce. I've pumped it up a little bit, 3 times to keep the PSI correct. It isn't very durable for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: MATT CEGLIE

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Not bad...Great grip and a soft feel but the ball is coming apart at the seams. I dont think its gonna last too long.
customer_reviews.author: Katie P.

customer_reviews.title: ... has an incredible grip and comes off the fingers like a basketball should
customer_reviews.text: Ball has an incredible grip and comes off the fingers like a basketball should.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it. Went out in bare feet Christmas morning to shoot hoops on the drive way mother dragged him back in.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Savard

customer_reviews.title: Great ball overall however..
customer_reviews.text: It's a great ball with excellent feel and bounce however the one we received has a slow leak so it needs the pressure topped off each time we head to the gym. This brand and model though is a quality ball especially for the money... we just happened to get one with an air leak is what I think.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not round, bounces erratically
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointing. Son wanted a Nike ball, but I got this. It is out of round just a little bit which causes it to bounce in random directions when dribbled. I am going back to Nike and perhaps Baden where I hope to find a ball that actually is true.
customer_reviews.author: Capitalist Tool

customer_reviews.title: Great bounce, feel, and grip
customer_reviews.text: For years I've been buying Wilson and Spalding Street or Indoor/Outdoor balls for $10-$15. Always considered spending $30 on this to be completely unnecessary. Then I got to play with it. I play outdoor and I'd never a bounce off the pavement so much like off the hardwood. The feel of it is just like playing indoor. The grip is excellent too. I can palm it with a lot less squeezing than I do with Wilson or Spalding. I wouldn't spend the extra money if I played mostly indoor, but for playing street basketball, for me it's worth the extra $15.
customer_reviews.author: Bahman

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love the basketball! Still use the same ball after months. I really reccomend the ball. Very stylish also and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: he plays varsity basketball and is 16 years old and would recommend for others
customer_reviews.text: my son loves loves loves this basketball! he said he loves the feel of it! he plays varsity basketball and is 16 years old and would recommend for others!
customer_reviews.author: joseph c. ortis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Ball
customer_reviews.text: Look out spalding, wilson, and nike. Now I am still blocking during bball games like crazy, but the opponent is no getting under armour burgers now. This ball is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: martintx10

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: This ball is great, especially for the price. I was buying the Wilson Evolution religiously, but this is my go-to now. Believe it or not, it has become the ball of choice in pick up games. Good job, UA.
customer_reviews.author: frumpyguy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 15 yr old plays ball in the driveway...loves it. Says the grip is great
customer_reviews.author: Tom Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very nice ball
customer_reviews.text: So far playing outside has been great, except I've noticed that the balls surface material can be easily torn, my ball already has several small chunks torn out or ripped due to outdoor use. Somewhat frustrating but still a very good ball I would just recommend more indoor use.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Graves

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Ball!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ball for the price. I've had no complaints or issues with this ball. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Leroy Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Good quality basketball thus far
customer_reviews.text: The ball is not being used yet,it's for a Christmas gift but other than fold lines from being kept flat since manufacturer when I inflated the ball I could see high spots where the folds were. It seemed to go away when I reached full pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Junior

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its a gift for my friends son and he loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: Rene Espana

customer_reviews.title: Great ball!
customer_reviews.text: I like this ball mainly due to its nice grip and quality. I plan on using it both indoor and outdoor.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Good Ball
customer_reviews.text: The 495 is a good ball for the price. It is very tacky and when used outdoors it can get dusty quick. Other reviews said its better than the Wilson Evolution, but its not. After using it for a week i decided to buy the 595. For about 10 more bucks you can buy the 595 which feels a lot better. Overall a good ball, not great.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R Jamora

customer_reviews.title: both loose air but one is especially bad..
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2, both loose air but one is especially bad... Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.author: Connie Cary

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Would like it to be more scuff resistant on comcrete.
customer_reviews.author: TOM TUCK

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The ball deflates and doesn't keep. Wish I would've checked to late for return.
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Brand new, this thing feel awesom and looks great. Afer about a months use, the grip and texture wore off very quickly. Its a decent ball, just expected it to hold up a little better.
customer_reviews.author: SpeedRacer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I have several basketballs from Nike, Spalding and Wilson and by far this is my new go to ball for my indoor games. It has an excellent weight, nice tack and ridges. It feels good when I dribble it and it has definitely improved my accuracy better than my other favorite the Wilson Evolution. Highly recommended..
customer_reviews.author: Ievalu8shipntime

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay inflated
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two. One of them deflates overnight. The other is OK, but needs to be "topped up" every 3 or 4 days.
customer_reviews.author: SCal Business

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bad ball. Too hard to play. So easy to hurt your fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Ownnyc

product_meta.title: Under Armour 495 Indoor/Outdoor Basketball, Official/Size 7
product_meta.description:
Indoor/Outdoor Basketball features tackified composite cover for excellent grip and feel. Deep channels for better control. 80% nylon windings for excellent shape retention. 100% butyl bladder for maximum aire retention. Official Men's Size 7.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Indoor/Outdoor Basketball features tackified composite cover for excellent grip and feel. Deep channels for better control. 80% nylon windings for excellent shape retention. 100% butyl bladder for maximum air retention. Official Men's Size 7.
feature_bullets: 100% Butyl Bladder for Maximum Air Retention
For optimal performance, additional inflation may be required. Ball pump not included.
UA GRIPSKIN Composite for Ultimate Grip and Feel
